segments.text: Good morning , Room Service . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have lunch in my room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir . We offer two types of lunch , Chinese food and western food . Which one would you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does a Chinese food have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be fine . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . May I have your name and room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me confirm your order , Mr . White in Room 204 , Chinese food . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your order will be ready soon , thank you for calling .
segments.speaker: S1
